title: Factor the expression
text: Factoring is the process to split a product into a group of factors (a multiplication of simpler expressions).
speech: Factoring is the process to split a product into a group of factors (a multiplication of simpler expressions).
pacedSpeech: Factoring is the process to split a product into a group of factors (a multiplication of simpler expressions).

title: Factor the expression
text: Not all terms can be factored. Factor the terms that can be split further.
speech: Not all terms can be factored. Factor the terms that can be split further.
pacedSpeech: Not all terms can be factored. Factor the terms that can be split further.

title: Factor the expression
text: In this case, we can factor $$x^2+4x-5$$ and $$3x+18$$.

title: Cancel terms
text: Now that you have factored all possible terms, if you see the same term in the numerator and the denominator of the product, you can cancel it out.
speech: Now that you have factored all possible terms, if you see the same term in the numerator and the denominator of the product, you can cancel it out.

title: Cancel terms
text: What term can we cancel out?

title: Final Answer
text: After canceling out terms, your final answer will remain in product form. What is the answer?
